verses.verse: If <S%G1487><s%> ye <S%G3767>then<s%> be risen <S%G4891>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> those things which are <S%G507>above,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>sitteth<s%> <S%G2521><s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Set your affection <S%G5426>on<s%> things <S%G507>above,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> on <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> ye are <S%G599>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> is <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who is <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> shall <S%G5319>appear,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

Mortify <S%G3499><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth;<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> inordinate <S%G3806>affection,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1939>concupiscence,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> idolatry: <S%G1495><s%>

For which things' <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of disobedience: <S%G543><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> some <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> ye <S%G2198>lived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> put <S%G659>off<s%> all <S%G3956>these;<s%> <S%G3709>anger,<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G2549>malice,<s%> <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> filthy <S%G148>communication<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

Lie <S%G5574><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> one to <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G1519><s%> seeing that ye have put <S%G554>off<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4234>deeds;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> have put <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> man, which is <S%G341>renewed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of him that <S%G2936>created<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

Where <S%G3699><s%> there <S%G1762>is<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G1672>Greek<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision,<s%> <S%G915>Barbarian,<s%> <S%G4658>Scythian,<s%> <S%G1401>bond<s%> nor <S%G1658>free:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

Put <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1588>elect<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G25>beloved,<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> of <S%G3628>mercies,<s%> <S%G5544>kindness,<s%> humbleness of <S%G5012>mind,<s%> <S%G4236>meekness,<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering;<s%>

Forbearing <S%G430><s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> one <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3437>quarrel<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G5100>any:<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> do <S%G5210>ye.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5125>things<s%> put on <S%G26>charity,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G5047>perfectness.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1018>rule<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> ye are <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> ye <S%G2170>thankful.<s%>

Let <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1774>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4146>richly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom;<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5215>hymns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3748>whatsoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> ye <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%> do <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> submit <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> unto your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it is <S%G433>fit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
Husbands, <S%G435><s%> <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G1135>wives,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be not <S%G4087>bitter<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Children, <S%G5043><s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> your <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> well <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> <S%G2042>provoke<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> to anger, <S%G3363>lest<s%> they be <S%G120>discouraged.<s%>

Servants, <S%G1401><s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> your <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3787>eyeservice,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G441>menpleasers;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G572>singleness<s%> of <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3748>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2038>do<s%> it <S%G1537>heartily,<s%> <S%G5590><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G444>men;<s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> ye shall <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G469>reward<s%> of the <S%G2817>inheritance;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> ye <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he that doeth <S%G91>wrong<s%> shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> for the wrong which he hath <S%G91>done;<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons.<s%>
